name: puff flower easter egg
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
sizes_available: eggs can be made in various yarns with corresponding hook size, which will create different sized finished products. hook sizes for each yarn weight for #1 - #4 are given inside the pattern.
notes:
**another addictive, quick and cute pattern from crochet road!**

**includes a full video tutorial **

these 4 round easter eggs can be made in around 10 minutes each, once you get the hang of them.

enjoy this clear and easy to follow pattern, including many photos.

*use these easter eggs for different creative purposes:*

* create a horizontal or vertical garland. 
* add to children’s easter baskets.
* create easter themed random acts of crochet kindness.
* make an easter wreath with these eggs as a feature
* use as placeholders for easter celebrations
* make with embroidery thread and create a pair of earrings
* use as part of an easter egg hunt

almost any yarn weight can be used for this project, with corresponding hook size.

suggested hook sizes are given inside the pattern for 4 yarn weights from fingering up to bulky weight.

**finished size:**
finished sizes for easter eggs made with 4 common yarn weights are given inside the pdf 

can’t wait to see your creativity with this one, please share your beautiful work on social media so that we can all be inspired!

lots of love,
joy xxx
